ProductInfo.Features:
Memory:512 MB DDR,Storage:8 GB NAND Flash
Google Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean) OS reveals tons of new adventures to your Dragon Touch tablet. Get access to thousands of useful apps and fun games to download and install on you tablet with Google Play Store . Micro SD card slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra space to store songs, videos, photos and other files.
Wi-Fi (802.11a/b/g/n) keeps you connected on the go. Front-facing camera makes it easy to chat with friends and family, while rear-facing camera allows you to capture the special moments and upload them to facebook and twitter
Google GMS Certificated you can get free software from Google Play Store
Excellent Rechargeable Lithium Battery, 2800 mAh capacity, Can Last for 4 Hours.
ProductInfo.Name: Google GMS Certificated Condroid® X7 7 Inch Tablet Computer Capacitive Multi-touch LCD Screen Dual Core 1.4GHz 8GB Google Android 4.2 System (Black)
